amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $15,000,000 for emergency actions to reduce the threat to human safety arising from the threat of catastrophic fire in dead and dying trees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1201 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1201 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S9217-9218; text: CR S9217) To appropriate an additional $15,000,000 for emergency actions to reduce the threat to human safety arising from the threat of catastrophic fire in dead and dying trees.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1201 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1201 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feinstein.
